title: Hi Everyone, Can Anyone ID This Font?
content:
Hello,

Can anyone ID the "Texas Loghorns" font in the website header?

[www.texassports.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140126050004/http:/www.texassports.com/ "www.texassports.com")

Thanks so much
author: tm6464

comments.content:
Looks like Eurostile Bold.  
AKA Microgramma and others.

- HVB

Lex and HVB,

Thanks very much for your help.
